duties_responsibilities.duty: Learn and program on the Sailpoint platform and develop a highly in-demand skillset with cutting-edge tools.
Work on new feature enhancement, general maintenance, and support of the code base.
Communicate with team for status updates and reports.
Reach out to customers to complete tickets/requests.
Gather requirements for projects and outline testing processes for new code.
Update and write documentation for bug fixes and new functionality.

education_certification.credential: Information Technology, Computer Science, or related college degree required.
